definition: A slender, pointed object typically made of metal or wood, used for shooting or throwing at a target. It is commonly employed in activities such as archery or as a symbol to indicate direction.

examples.german: Sie schoss den Pfeil ins Ziel.
examples.english: She shot the arrow into the target.

examples.german: Der Pfeil traf das rote Feld.
examples.english: The arrow hit the red area.

examples.german: Er folgte dem Pfeil zur Ausfahrt.
examples.english: He followed the arrow to the exit.

examples.german: Der Pfeil auf der Karte zeigt nach Norden.
examples.english: The arrow on the map points north.
